languages.text: У каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия существуют две области стрельбы, эффективная и максимальная, задаваемые параметрами дальности. Параметр максимальной дальности стрельбы указывает допустимое расстояние для стрельбы по цели. Параметр эффективной дальности равен 50% от максимальной и показывает, на каком расстоянии стрельба будет наиболее эффективной.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
languages.original_text: У каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия существуют две области стрельбы, эффективная и максимальная, задаваемые параметрами дальности. Параметр максимальной дальности стрельбы указывает допустимое расстояние для стрельбы по цели. Параметр эффективной дальности равен 50% от максимальной и показывает, на каком расстоянии стрельба будет наиболее эффективной.

traits.locale_text: Every ranged weapon that fires single shots or bursts has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.

Every ranged weapon that fires single shots or bursts has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.

Every ranged weapon that fires single shots or bursts has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.

languages.text: Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}waffe hat zwei Schussbereiche, die durch die Reichweitenparameter der Waffe bestimmt werden: effektive Reichweite und maximale Reichweite. Der Parameter für die maximale Reichweite gibt die maximale Distanz an, auf die du ein Ziel triffst. Der Parameter für die effektive Reichweite entspricht 50 % der maximalen Reichweite der Waffe und gibt die optimale Distanz für das Abfeuern der Waffe an.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.

traits.locale_text: Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}waffe, die {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}einzelne Schüsse{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Geschosse{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}abfeuert{/g}, hat zwei Schussbereiche, die durch die Reichweitenparameter der Waffe bestimmt werden: effektive Reichweite und maximale Reichweite. Der Parameter für die maximale Reichweite gibt die größtmögliche Distanz an, auf die du ein Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}triffst{/g}. Der Parameter für die effektive Reichweite entspricht 50 % der maximalen Reichweite der Waffe und gibt die Distanz an, bei der das Abfeuern der Waffe optimal wäre.

Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}waffe hat zwei Schussbereiche, die durch die Reichweitenparameter der Waffe bestimmt werden: effektive Reichweite und maximale Reichweite. Der Parameter für die maximale Reichweite gibt die maximale Distanz an, auf die du ein Ziel triffst. Der Parameter für die effektive Reichweite entspricht 50 % der maximalen Reichweite der Waffe und gibt die optimale Distanz für das Abfeuern der Waffe an.

languages.text: Toutes les armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} possèdent deux zones de tir déterminées par leurs paramètres de portée : la portée efficace et la portée maximale. La portée maximale représente la distance maximale à laquelle il est possible d'atteindre une cible. La portée efficace est égal à 50 % de la portée maximale de l'arme et représente la distance à laquelle le tir peut être optimisé.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} possèdent deux zones de tir déterminées par leurs paramètres de portée : la portée efficace et la portée maximale. Le paramètre de portée maximale représente la distance maximale à laquelle il est possible d'atteindre une cible. Le paramètre de portée efficace est égal à 50 % de la portée maximale de l'arme et représente la distance à laquelle le tir peut être optimisé.

languages.text: 每种{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器都有两片开火区域，分别对应有效射程与最大射程。武器的射程由武器自身属性决定。最大射程代表武器有可能命中目标的最远距离。有效射程为最大射程的一半，代表武器命中率最高的距离。
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.

traits.locale_text: 每种{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器都有两片开火区域，分别对应有效射程与最大射程。武器的射程由武器自身属性决定。最大射程代表武器有可能命中目标的最远距离。有效射程为最大射程的一半，代表武器命中率最高的距离。

languages.text: Todas las armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} cuentan con dos zonas de disparo, determinadas por los parámetros de alcance del arma: el alcance efectivo y el alcance máximo. El parámetro de alcance máximo indica la distancia máxima posible a la que puede impactar a un objetivo. El parámetro de alcance efectivo equivale a un 50 % del alcance máximo del arma e indica la distancia en la que resultaría más efectivo disparar con el arma.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.

traits.locale_text: Todas las armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} cuentan con dos zonas de disparo, determinadas por los parámetros de alcance del arma: el alcance efectivo y el alcance máximo. El parámetro de alcance máximo indica la distancia máxima posible a la que puede impactar a un objetivo. El parámetro de alcance efectivo equivale a un 50 % del alcance máximo del arma e indica la distancia en la que resultaría más efectivo disparar con el arma.

languages.original_text: Every remote weapon, whether firing single shots or bursts, has two firing ranges, an effective range and a maximum range, defined by the range parameters. The maximum range parameter indicates the allowable distance for firing at the target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the maximum range and indicates at what distance the gun will be most effective.

languages.text: 単発式や連射で発射する{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}武器には2つの射撃範囲があり、その範囲は武器の射程パラメータである有効射程および最大射程により決まる。最大射程パラメータは標的を撃つことのできる最大の距離を表す。有効射程パラメータは武器の最大射程の50%に相当し、射撃の最適距離を示す。
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.

traits.locale_text: 単発式や連射で発射する{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}武器には2つの射撃範囲があり、その範囲は武器の射程パラメータである有効射程および最大射程により決まる。最大射程パラメータは標的を撃つことのできる最大の距離を表す。有効射程パラメータは武器の最大射程の50%に相当し、射撃の最適距離を示す。

languages.text: Her {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} silah, o silahın etkili menzil ve maksimum menzil adı verilen menzil parametrelerince belirlenen iki atış alanına sahiptir. Maksimum menzil parametresi, bir hedefi vurabilmek için mümkün olan en uzak mesafeyi belirtir. Etkili menzil parametresi, silahın maksimum menzilinin %50'sine eşittir ve hangi mesafeden ateş etmenin en etkili olacağını gösterir.
languages.original_text: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
